headline: Wells Fargo downgrades Comcast on rising costs from its mobile pivot
summary: Investing.com -- Wells Fargo downgraded Comcast Corp (NASDAQ:CMCSA) to “Underweight” from “Equal Weight,” warning the cable giant’s shift toward mobile and broadband convergence will pressure earnings in the near term and strip the stock of its defensive appeal.
